SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,category,title,content,viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') AS regdate FROM A_notice
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content Like '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM A_notice
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content Like '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,category,title,content,viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') AS regdate, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM A_notice) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
